TopicTitle: Realistic Engine Sounds in a Planet's Atmosphere

Articles.Content:
I already emailed Squad about this, but I thought it would be cool to share my suggestion with everyone!

 

You know how rockets are really loud at sea level, and they are silent in space? I was playing a game on Roblox called Space Sailors and I noticed that the rocket's engine sounds got quieter as the rocket exited the earth's atmosphere. Then I remembered KSP doesn't have that (or stock real plume). I thought it would be a good suggestion to implement the gradual sound increase or decrease (due to pressure) as a optional setting or just a game feature (you know what I mean).

There's a mod for that in KSP. I don't like the idea of silent engines though- while it might be "unrealistic", it also helps you to know that they're actually working and it would be too quiet otherwise.
That's why I said that it could be a setting that you could toggle on and off. Maybe there could be an indicator of whether you have engines on or not.
